mapper.select: -- retrievePrjPtotPrptSearchInfo 지적재산권 목록 조회 SELECT 0 as "chk" , PRPT_ID as "prptId" /*지적재산권ID*/ , PRJ_CD as "prjCd" /*프로젝트코드*/ , WBS_CD as "wbsCd" /*WBS코드*/ , PRPT_GOAL_YEAR as "prptGoalYear" /*목표년도*/ , PRPT_GOAL_CNT as "prptGoalCnt" /*목표개수*/ , FRNW_SCN as "frnwScn" /*특허구분*/ , 0 as "patCnt" /*실적지적재산권 개수*/ FROM IRIS_PRJ_PTOT_PRPT WHERE PRJ_CD = #{prjCd} ORDER BY PRPT_GOAL_YEAR DESC
